AI Description: Pyro is a universal probabilistic programming language (PPL) built on top of PyTorch. It is designed to enable flexible and expressive deep probabilistic modeling, variational inference, and probabilistic programming.
Core Features:
1. Deep probabilistic modeling
2. Variational inference
3. Probabilistic programming capabilities
4. Incorporates PyTorch for scalable deep learning
5. Extensive library for stochastic variational inference and MCMC algorithms
General Tags: Probabilistic Programming Language, Deep Learning, Variational Inference, Pytorch
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Artificial Intelligence & Intelligent Systems
